00135     class Iterator {
00136         friend class CursusManager;
00137         Cursus** currentCursus; 
00138         unsigned int nbRemain;
00144         Iterator(Cursus** c, unsigned nb):currentCursus(c),nbRemain(nb){}
00145        public:
00149             Iterator():nbRemain(0),currentCursus(0){}
00154             bool isDone() const { return nbRemain==0; }
00158             void next() {
00159                 if (isDone())
00160                         throw UTProfilerException("error, next on an iterator which is done");
00161                 nbRemain--;
00162                 currentCursus++;
00163             }
00168             Cursus& current() const {
00169                 if (isDone())
00170                     throw UTProfilerException("error, indirection on an iterator which is done");
00171                 return **currentCursus;
00172             }
00173     };

00179         return Iterator(mesCursus,nbCursus);
